posts.name: scott-signal
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.71.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • Hard at work fixing bugs and making other performance improvements to keep the app running smoothly for you.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.70.0-beta.1…v7.71.0-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.70 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.71.0-beta.1

41 new commits since 7.70.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.71.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Add .screenshot() method to mock tests [2]

  • Update text in donations discard dialog [3]

  • Improve left pane search bar behavior [4]

  • Donations dialogs visual fixes [5]

  • Fix flaky test models/messages getNotificationData [6]

  • Merge ProgressCircle into SpinnerV2 [7]

  • Donations: show modal when we can't apply the user's badge [8]

  • Remove sealed sender proto file in favor of libsignal types [9]

  • Fix image spinner [10]

  • Create AriaClickable component [11]

  • Fix stuck in-call close dialog overlay when cancelling [12]

  • Upgrade electron to 37.4.0 [13]

  • Fix remote config for configs with unspecified on-off values [14]

  • Fixes for donation amount picker [15]

  • Localize payment card expiration date [16]

  • Use donations prod flag [17]

  • Fix Donation payment card fields in RTL [18]

  • Use toLowerCase for config values [19]

  • Release notes for 7.70 [20]

  • Update strings [21]

  • Update DNS fallback [22]

  • Upgrade libsignal-client to 0.79.1 [23]

  • Remove non-libsignal-net Chat websocket [24]

  • Fix position of currency select dropdown caret [25]

  • Fix donations toast to show only on resume after restart [26]

  • Simplify undownloadable attachment states [27]

  • Fix benchmark CI misattribution & flake [28]

  • Update backups branding [29]

  • Discard invalid incrementalMacs [30]

  • Improve message attachment parsing [31]

  • Improve handling of backup CDN read credentials [32]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.57.1 [33]

  • Add debugging toast when attachment download from backup tier fails [34]

  • Clarify resumable download paths [35]

  • Support symlinked stickers.noindex folder [36]

  • Update backups feature flags [37]

  • Add media granularity to backup attachment download source [38]

  • Release notes for 7.71 [39]

  • Update strings [40]

  • 7.71.0-beta.1 [41]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.70.0-beta.1…v7.71.0-beta.1

posts.name: ClauZ
posts.cooked:
7.71.0-beta.1

I changed my profile picture and I got this error

image1511×625 41.1 KB

then the picture changed, but I lost my name, now it shows my phone number.

desktop log: https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.71.0-beta.1/389133ddc44643a10946327c6cd4ae895d42fedfd167ef2b51dea9cfa658e36e.gz

I should probably mention that the linked android client, is in some weird state, where I can’t enable remote backups…

Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.56 release

7.56.5 Network failure when trying to enable remote backups

I enabled Backups, on desktop, but there’s no file in the location that I set…
Is there a way to manually start a backup ?

also, in the Desktop Backups view there’s this text, that tells you how to restore a back-up, but I don’t see any Restore backup button when installing a new copy of Signal ..

image804×135 6.5 KB

We’re talking about a new copy of Signal-Desktop right ?

log: https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.71.0-beta.1/f024845abb83d61064823d9f2afdc65c50247e926013b456478908e18617247d.gz

posts.name: ClauZ
posts.cooked:
Stuck at syncing contacts and groups

So I had an android and a linked desktop, I had remote backups enabled paid version
then I did the following

Step 1: Send 1 large file (90Mb) from the desktop in note to self and in a group
Step 2: Wait for note to self file to finish upload
Step 3: Trigger remote backup manually, on Android
Step 4: While the upload was still loading on the desktop client in the group Unlink the desktop from Android
Step 5: Trigger another remote backup manually, on Android
Step 6: The yellow unlinked banner shows up on Desktop
Step 7: Clear app data on Android, and register again thru the I don't have my old phone flow on Android
Step 7.1: Check if the note to self file that finished uploading on desktop exists in Android’s note to self, it does not
Step 8: Go to Linked devices on android to link the desktop again
Step 9: Notice that the QR code has been scanned successfully, but there’s no new linked device in the list on Android
Step 10: Notice that Desktop is stuck on Syncing contacts and groups

image1201×819 21 KB
image449×1035 70.6 KB

Step 11: Get debug log on Android: https://debuglogs.org/android/7.56.5/b6857d43491925526147872065c4605c409bc652a336acb231064f96d5398d86

Step 12: Get debug log on Desktop: https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.71.0-beta.2/2563c9c295750844b4875302cc9410ee83ea597b1b967c81c2faeae0cff2355b.gz

message before the incomplete upload on Android: 1757637216365
incomplete Desktop upload message: 1757637275597
note to self file that finished uploading on Desktop: 1757637208483

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.56 release

posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked: Local backups on Desktop were enabled incorrectly in v7.71.0-beta.1, sorry for that confusion.

posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked:
That error was shown because you had an empty profile name; profile changes should succeed if you add one.

Can you confirm:

  1. you had a profile name and avatar
  2. you changed the avatar
  3. your profile name was removed?

Please let us know if this is reproducible.

posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked:
ClauZ:

https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.71.0-beta.2/2563c9c295750844b4875302cc9410ee83ea597b1b967c81c2faeae0cff2355b.gz

Thanks, is this reproducible? I’m sharing with the Android team.

posts.name: ClauZ
posts.cooked:
trevor-signal:

Thanks, is this reproducible?

don’t know .. there’s been a new patch version released for Android, but I’ll try to reproduce the issue, and let you know

posts.name: ClauZ
posts.cooked:
trevor-signal:

Thanks, is this reproducible?

Yes, It is reproducible.. I used the same steps as above..

It seems to happen if you unlink a desktop client while it’s uploading a file. then when you try to relink it, it will freeze at “syncing contacts” and will not show up in the link devices list.

image489×136 5.71 KB

screenshots

image1355×784 21.4 KB
image492×1036 72.1 KB

desktop log: https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.71.0-beta.2/3f5041bfad3cc3fc3e9da13c83f75c4495075d1b1808a9c0626aef00cb59c5e4.gz

Android log: https://debuglogs.org/android/7.56.8/47f61b49f33b8498a5409e05076e8676892ba2432358242cc83ea69892166305

still uploading media message id: 1758056115963
